about_the_game:
Make your dream come true and excperince the wonders of owning your own resturant. Or why not two, why not three or even four?

Kitchen Carnage is a single player simulation game. You get to own your own resturants and managing them all at the same time all alone. The different restuarants layouts, customer orders and food combinations will always keep you stressed and on your feet.



But fear not! With a steady hand and a knack for multitasking, you'll navigate through the ups and downs of running a restaurant. Each level in Kitchen Carnage presents a fresh set of obstacles, from changing environments to a rotating menu of dishes.

So, get ready to roll up your sleeves and tackle the chaos of Kitchen Carnage head-on! With quick thinking and adaptability, you'll conquer every twist and turn in this exciting culinary journey.

name: Kitchen Carnage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Graphics Card from the last 10 years
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Kitchen Carnage: Dive into the chaotic world of restaurant ownership! Manage all your restaurant alone and at once there is no time for any brakes! With ever-changing environments and menus you will have to adapt for a chance of survival in the restaurant business!
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Swedish*, French*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
